翼.definition: wing; area surrounding the bullseye of a target; to assist; one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy; old variant of 翌

翼城.definition: Yicheng county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi

翼城縣.definition: Yicheng county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi

翼瓣.definition: (botany) alae; wing petals (of a papilionaceous flower)
